contributoR 0.1.0
  • Reference

contributoR

An R package for documenting scholarly contributions.

Last update: 2020-10-30

Overview

The goal of contributoR is to facilitate the documentation of scholarly contributions. This package uses the CRediT taxonomy to define contributor roles.

Installation

You can install the development version from GitHub with:

install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jvcasillas/contributoR")

Usage

library("contributoR")

# Create example list
ex_1 <- list(
 JVC = 1:13,
 JGP = 1,
 NR  = c(2, 4))

# Plot contributions
contributor(contributions = ex_1)

# Build list inside function
contributor(
 contributions = list(
   "Author 1" = seq(1, 14, by = 3),
   "Author 2" = c(1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 13),
   "Lazy person" = NA,
   "Advisor" = 12)
   )
